items.text:
You may immediately proceed to the travel phase of the round. If you do, you can travel to any location connected to a river (even if there are ready cards with the obstacle keyword in play). Use the river terrain type. If you choose to travel
in this way, discard the current challenge card, and do not resolve the
remainder of this test.

If you choose not to travel, discard Vira, and resolve the remainder of
the test as normal.
